instructions: Head over to Settings . Select Display & Brightness . Under the Display Zoom header, tap the View field. Now choose Zoomed . You can view a few previews before choosing if you like.
Go to Settings and tap your name at the top. Select iCloud . Scroll down and tap Find My iPhone . Enable Find My iPhone and Send Last Location.

Open the Phone app. Select Favorites from the bottom bar. Tap the Plus icon at the top-left corner to bring up your contacts list. Select a contact to add to your favorites, then choose what type of contact to add (calling, messaging, etc.)
